name: Debbie Hodge
text: Cute restaurant with great food. I had the crawfish basket with corn on the cob and French bread. The staff is friendly and efficient.

name: Scott Tugya
text: The cuisine, specifically the duck, was absolutely phenomenal, as was the New Zealand lamb. The staff was professional and polite. The interior of the restaurant was spotless and inviting. In short it was a very pleasant evening to a rather tumultuous Monday. I highly recommend this establishment for fine dining. My only critique is that is was a rather difficult find for me; in that, it was recommend by Yankee Candel staff at the Huntsville Mall, I guess dinner recommendations come in all manner...

name: Bill Thygerson
text:
Stopped by for a quick lunch, and was glad I did.

The soup of the day, cream of artichoke, was thick, hot, creamy (duh), and excellent.  I hope they have it again soon.

The chicken medallions marsala with wild mushrooms included sides of garlic mashed potatoes and vegetable medley were beautifully presented and delicious.

Then there was the  "Chocolate Eruption" -- a generous slice of chocolate cake filled with chocolate mousse, chunks of cheesecake, toffee, and caramel topped with whipped cream and chocolate.   It was magnificent.

Our server was friendly, knowledgeable, and always there when you needed her. Prices were very reasonable.

All in all, a VERY pleasant experience.  Highly recommended.  We'll be back for sure.

name: LifeChange35
text: Excellent food and service. Fresh yummy local!!!

name: Harold Burkett
text: Just ate here for the first time. Came for a romantic anniversary dinner with my wife and they did not disappoint. One of the few places I've eaten where the food served looked as picture perfect as the website. Service was excellent and food was delicious. Will return soon.

name: Ashley Pallotta
text: This place has possibly the best food in Huntsville. And price is extremely reasonable, especially during lunch hours! The setting is adorable, especially the outdoor patio. We love their chicken cordon bleu, beef tips, and at dinner their chicken Alfredo is amazing ($16).

name: Todd Town
text: Great staff! Wade runs a tight ship. Can't wait for the remodel to be complete!

name: Mary Jo Kinzer
text: A great place to go for date night. Food and service are excellent.

name: Justin Rosoff
text: Great food, service can be slow but worth the visit.

name: Jose Rivera
text: When't with my girlfriend for our very first official date, and the way her face lit up when she saw the table in the back was worth every penny. Will always recommend.

name: K.D. Kromminga (Gnostic Heathen)
text: D&L Bistro is out of business please remove their listing.

name: N Grothe
text: The place is currently closed for renovations - and 7/27/2017

name: Nick Tucker
text: Smells like delicious seafood walking in.

name: Harvie Kruer
text:
This place has been "closed for renovations" since November 2016. I have tried going here four times since then and it still isn't open as of today (10/06/2017) Clearly there are some serious issues that need to be resolved with this establishment. Such a shame.
Edit: Still closed as of (2/28/2018)
